page.title: 08A TYPICAL DAY AT SCHOOL.
page.content: On a{Friday}morning at{8.35am}I go to the{bus-stop}to wait for the bus. Lisa, my friend, waits at the bus-stop aswell. When the bus comes, I go and sit beside Claire. Lisa sits beside Anna. I go to{Paddock School.}When I arrive, there is an{assembly.}After assembly we do{"SMP"}which are cards with{sums}on them. Then it is {play-time.}After play-time we continue with SMP until{12 o'clock.}Then we have{dinner}in the dining-room. After dinner, we go out to play. At the end of play, I go to my{recorder lesson. {Mrs.Stott}is the recorder teacher. I play the{Treble, Descant and Soprano, these are different types of recorder. I play alot of music. Then it is {afternoon play-time.}After play we do {P.E,}in which we do{games.}We play {football and cricket. {KETYUEN CHIU Paddock J&I School
